description: Try our easy to follow Zucchini Pasta Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Zucchini Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to instructions on the pack. Set aside.

Add oil and garlic to a medium frying pan over medium heat and sauté for 2 minutes. Add thyme and zucchini and cook for 5 minutes or until wilted and some of the moisture has evaporated. Add hemp flour, milk and 1 cup of cheese and stir to combine. Season with pepper to taste.

Turn off heat, add eggs and stir to combine. Stir in pasta and transfer to a 2L ovenproof dish. Pat down top of mixture with the back of a spoon to level. Scatter over cherry tomatoes and remaining cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden on top. Serve with ricotta cheese crumbled on top.
